subject: I'm Mr Tom Bobolo from west
body:
I'm Mr Tom Bobolo from west Africa. I have a business deal to share with you in the sum of 10. 2 Million USD Dollars that has been held here in (B.O.A) bank of Africa. The fund mentioned above rightfully belongs to one of our late client who deposited the money in our bank here, ever since he died nobody has been able to apply to claim the fund. So I hope that you will come and assume as his foreign business partner.
Also note this business is risk free, you do not have to be scared or doubtful of its reality. Please my dearest one also note this, once we succeed in transferring this fund to your provided account in your country it will be shared among us in-agreement of 60% to 40%. I believe that after this deal joy and happiness will be on our faces and families. Please reply to me with your details so we can move on with this great plan okay.
REPLY TO-- ( 
btom7210@gmail.com
 )
Your Full Name.......
Your Age&Sex........
Your Marital Status......
Your Country Name.......
Your Phone Number......
Your Occupation.....
Your Bank Name......
Your Account Number.....
Thanks Yours Brotherly
Mr. Tom Bobolo

subject: Re:   I'm Mr Tom Bobolo from west
body:
Hello Mr. Tom Bobolo,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this business opportunity. I appreciate your trust in sharing this information with me. However, before we proceed, I would like to know more details about the business deal you mentioned.

Could you please provide me with some additional information? Specifically, I would like to understand the nature of the business and how it is risk-free. Additionally, could you clarify how my involvement as a foreign business partner would work?

I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Alice

subject: Re: I'm Mr Tom Bobolo from west
body: I will send you the details.

subject: Re: I'm Mr Tom Bobolo from west
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about the details you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional information?

Best wishes,
Alice

subject: Re: I'm Mr Tom Bobolo from west
body:
Dear Alice,
                        THIS IS MORE DETAILS ABOUT THE TRANSACTION:

Thank you so much for your kind response towards my proposal,please
try to understand that I don't have any bad intention to  contact you
in this great opportunity, but I believe it will be a great benefit to
both of us if you handle it with honesty and sincerity.

To be very honest with you, this transaction I have opened-up to you
is totally genuine and 100% risk-free. I am absolutely assuring you
that no trouble or problems will be involved in this transaction
either  in the short or in the long-run because I have been
working with this bank for many years now, which I know all its
ethiques very well,i and my colleagues have carefully mapped-out our
perfect strategies to carry out this transaction successfully.

Moreover, you have to understand that the deceased customer of this
bank late Dr. Walid Ahmed Juffali who deposited the money in question
is a well known Businessman and Investor, and since his death nobody
has ever come to claim this deposited funds. While the bank management
 has been waiting for any of his relative/business partner to come-up
for the claim, that is the main reason why I decided to contact you,
so that you will stand as his foreign business partner and apply to my
Bank here with the information which I am going to give you to apply
as his foreign Business Partner to enable them to start processing the
 transfer of the fund into any bank account of your choice. And once
the fund is transferred to the bank account that you will provide to
my bank, I will then arrange my travelling documents and visit your
Country for us to share the fund accordingly.

Please note very well that I am still working with this bank hence I
am in good position to give you all the necessary information that
will assist you to claim this fund successfully, but please do not
betray or disappoint me when you finally receive the fund into your
bank account.

Note: I can only reach you through email whenever I am in the office
for security reasons, because our calls might be monitored while in
the office. I just have to be sure of whom I am dealing with, as you
can see the amount is a huge sum of money and we have to build trust
between each other to achieve our aim.

I am waiting to hear from you, so that I will give you the application
form  and bank contact information for you to apply to the bank as his
foreign business partner, and in less than 14 working days the money
will be transferred into your account and I will come over for my share
of the fund.

I am expecting to hear from you for further clarification as soon as
possible.

Thanks a lot in anticipation of your quick reply,
Thanks
My Best regards.
Mr.Tom Bobolo.
Tel +22601520663 WhatsApp

subject: Re: I'm Mr Tom Bobolo from west
body:
Dear Alice,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your understanding and assure you that I have no bad intentions in contacting you. I truly believe that this opportunity can be beneficial for both of us if we handle it with honesty and sincerity.

I want to emphasize that what I am sharing with you is completely genuine, and I assure you that there will be no trouble or problems involved. I have been working with this bank for many years and know its ethics very well. My colleagues and I have carefully planned our strategies to carry out this transaction smoothly.

It is important to understand that the deceased customer of this bank, late Dr. Walid Ahmed Juffali, was a well-known investor. Since his passing, nobody has come forward to claim the funds he deposited. The bank has been waiting for any of his relatives or business partners to make a claim. That is why I decided to contact you, so that you can stand as his foreign business partner and apply to my bank here.

Once you apply as his foreign business partner, the bank will start processing the transfer of the funds into any bank account of your choice. After the funds are transferred, I will arrange my travel documents and visit your country so that we can share the fund together.

Please note that I am still working with this bank, which puts me in a good position to provide you with all the necessary information to claim this fund. However, please do not betray or disappoint me once you receive the funds into your bank account.

For security reasons, it is best if we communicate through email as our calls might be monitored while in the office. We need to be sure of whom we are dealing with since the amount involved is quite substantial. Building trust between each other is crucial for us to achieve our aim.

I am eagerly waiting to hear from you so that I can provide you with the necessary form and bank contact details for you to apply as his foreign business partner. Once you apply, the money will be transferred into your account within a few working days, and I will then come over to receive my share of the fund.

Please reply as soon as possible so that we can proceed further. Thank you for your quick response.

Best wishes,
Alice

subject: Re: I'm Mr Tom Bobolo from west
body:
You're welcome my dear, thanks for responding to my proposal too, hope to
get to know you better, please should i go ahead and give you the Bank
Application form so that you can contact them for further details and
documents?

subject: Re: I'm Mr Tom Bobolo from west
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your response. Could you please provide me with more information about the proposal and what the bank form is for? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Alice

subject: Re: I'm Mr Tom Bobolo from west
body:
Alright my dear,the form i will send you to fiil and submit to our bank
is,form as the Business partner and next of kin to the Deceased customer,
when you fill this one and submit,the Bank will now go through your
submission,if they are satisfied,they will now send you Bank official next
of Kin form, which you will also fill and return to them,then they will ask
you some questions and details you know about the Deceased customer,after
then they give you some other forms to fill and submit,once they're are
satisfied with the informations you submitted ,and you comply with all the
requirements,they will effect the transfer of the fund to your nominated
bank account immediately,i will be directing you in areas you find
difficult to provide the answers,,just let me know whatever they ask you
to do,i will direct you on how to go about, thanks for your time, waiting
to hear from you.

subject: Re: I'm Mr Tom Bobolo from west
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to share information with me. Could you please provide me with more details about the deceased customer and the nature of this transfer? I want to make sure I understand everything correctly before proceeding.

subject: Re: I'm Mr Tom Bobolo from west
body:
My dear,the name of the deceased customer is Dr Wallid Ahmed Juffali,he is

subject: Re: I'm Mr Tom Bobolo from west
body:

subject: Re: I'm Mr Tom Bobolo from west
body:
The only way you can help me here is to stand as his business partner and
next of kin,i will be giving you every information the Bank requires from

will come over to your country,for my share,and i will want you to
introduce me to good business that i will invest my own share of the fund
in your country.Remember am in the office now, take it slow with much
questions please,and if you are applying to the Bank as i told earlier,do
it now that am in the office so that i will follow it up,to make it easy
for us.

subject: Re: I'm Mr Tom Bobolo from west
body:

subject: SUBJECT: Tom bobolo
body:
I think I have answered you this questions already,and i have told you the

convince them that you're truly his business partner and next of kin,and i

already?

body:
